Text: PSCoEnron PPA First Amendment FinalForwarded by Stephen ThomeHOUECT on PM Alan Larsen PM To Jake CT Jeff G CT Stephen CT Mark CT Jonalan CT cc Christopher F CT Sheila CT Karen E CT Chip nron David CT Brian CT Paul CT Subject PSCoEnron PPA First Amendment Final Here is the execution version of the PPA amendment I am taking a copy to Jake for his signature which I will then fax to Jim Jordan today I will also get Jake to sign two hard copies that we will send by overnight courier to Jim Jordan for execution as described below in Don Kanes note Forwarded by Alan LarsenPDXECT on PM G Donohue Kane on PM To cc Subject PSCoEnron PPA First Amendment Final Al Attached is the amendment with the two small changes we discussed Jim Jordan will look for your overnight package with two signed originals tomorrow morning Upon receipt Jim will i obtain the signature of PSCos Paul Bonavia ii fax a copy of the fully executed amendment to you and iii return one fully executed original by overnight delivery to your attention If you have any questions please feel free to call me or Jim Don Kane TDOC

PSCoEnron PPA First Amendment FinalForwarded by Stephen ThomeHOUECT on PM Alan Larsen PM To Jake CT Jeff G CT Stephen CT Mark CT Jonalan CT cc Christopher F CT Sheila CT Karen E CT Chip nron David CT Brian CT Paul CT Subject PSCoEnron PPA First Amendment Final Here is the execution version of the PPA amendment I am taking a copy to Jake for his signature which I will then fax to Jim Jordan today I will also get Jake to sign two hard copies that we will send by overnight courier to Jim Jordan for execution as described below in Don Kanes note Forwarded by Alan LarsenPDXECT on PM G Donohue Kane on PM To cc Subject PSCoEnron PPA First Amendment Final Al Attached is the amendment with the two small changes we discussed Jim Jordan will look for your overnight package with two signed originals tomorrow morning Upon receipt Jim will i obtain the signature of PSCos Paul Bonavia ii fax a copy of the fully executed amendment to you and iii return one fully executed original by overnight delivery to your attention If you have any questions please feel free to call me or Jim Don Kane TDOC
ABB Dash Cc The previous Enron Americas DASH has been replaced with the one attached below Chris if you will sign and fax me the signature page I will route the document Steve

FW Turbine screen captures Cc Louise Here are the screen captures plus the latest long description version On the short desription the option price has been modified to k The number was only a placeholder Steve Original Message From Meredith Kevin Sent Friday September AM To Thome Stephen Subject Turbine screen captures Steve Here is a document containing the three screen captures we discussed I hope they are not too difficult to see Let me know if you need anything else Kevin Meredith EnronOnline
RE eNYMEX Cc Here is the turbine description expanded version If your received something with a table in it that was sent out in error This decription is subject ENA legal review Steve

RE eNYMEX Cc Louise We refreshing our turbine purchase agreement to address some transfer liabilities associated with removing the turbines from a third party site Other than that I see no reason that will delay our providing our docs to EOL this week In the meantime we are discussing an auction or offer price format with EOL Steve Original Message From Kitchen Louise Sent Wednesday August PM To Thome Stephen Richter Brad Calger Christopher F Cc Webb Jay Taylor Mark E Legal Subject RE eNYMEX Sounds like a great idea how quickly can you get it out there Original Message From Thome Stephen Sent Wednesday August AM To Richter Brad Kitchen Louise Calger Christopher F Cc Webb Jay Taylor Mark E Legal Subject RE eNYMEX Brad We may consider targeting a wide audience Since these turbines are not the technology of choice for many large corporate entities our target audience may need to be somewhat more diverse Our only prerequisite for purchase is the ability to raise MM plus option fees I have two primary documents One is the spec sheet and a general scope The other is a turbine purchase agreement A counterparty can have two options One is to contact us to provide a bid There would be no price assurance or exclusivity in this case Their other choice is to accept our offer on a turbine option contract For MM they would have a day call on the turbines during which they would be permitted to conduct their due diligence The MM buys them price assurance and an exclusivity period It may be a nuance but our offer price is on the call not the actual turbine Is this consistent with EOLs format Steve Original Message From Richter Brad Sent Wednesday August AM To Kitchen Louise Cc Webb Jay Thome Stephen Taylor Mark E Legal Subject RE eNYMEX Armed with a target list of purchasers we can craft the new product popup to hit those companies systems when they log on which would give them the following information General description of the assets Contact information names numbers Directions on refiltering for the Turbine Product which would be housed under US Power and accessible only to those preapproved companies The Long Description would essentially be the turbines Spec Sheet But if a counterparty clicks on the Offer we could replace the GTCs with a Term Sheet or LOI which binds the counterparty to days of diligence with a breakup fee if the deal doesnt close If the company isnt willing to commit to that the contact information will be their route to getting more information Thoughts Brad Original Message From Kitchen Louise Sent Tuesday August PM To Richter Brad Cc Webb Jay Thome Stephen Taylor Mark E Legal Subject RE eNYMEX Ahha The turbines idea on EOL I dont want to post an advetisement only I want them to post the turbines themselves So essentially just like a new product launch we would have a pop up announcing a new product and the new product would be our turbines exactly the same as any other product They have to post the turbines out there and obviously there will only be an offer and they will be for the ABBs we actually have in Canada You never know someone may click it would be an interesting concept and probably nonbinding as there would be site inspections etc But not an advert actually posting the turbines Louise Original Message From Richter Brad Sent Tuesday August PM To Kitchen Louise Cc Webb Jay Subject RE eNYMEX Bob Shults and I will be attending an eNYMEX reception this Thursday and John and Greg are still trying to coordinate a meeting with Bo and Vincent Short answer weve got it as covered as possible for now Another item I got a call from Stephen Thome in ENA who wanted us to post something like an advertisement for your turbines on EnronOnline Jay confirmed that it was technically feasible to craft a popup that targets certain customers with information and links to documents and spec sheets Im told we have resisted this approach in the past because it has the potential to get out of hand once the genie gets out of the bottle so to speak I think it fits well for the turbines but I wanted to make sure you were behind this idea before we launched into development Brad Original Message From Kitchen Louise Sent Tuesday August AM To Piper Greg Leach Doug Cc Richter Brad Webb Jay Subject RE eNYMEX I am assuming that Greg Piper is going to handle this you may want to talk to John Arnold as he has some good ideas for a deal with Nymex Original Message From Piper Greg Sent Wednesday August AM To Leach Doug Kitchen Louise Cc Richter Brad Webb Jay Whalley Greg Subject RE eNYMEX I would be happy to meet with them so feel free to set something up We have had contact in the past with NYMEX on some of these issues and I can explain the story later My asistant is Tina Spiller and I am in next week I am in London this week so maybe we can get together and discuss thanks GP Original Message From Leach Doug Sent Tuesday August PM To Kitchen Louise Piper Greg Cc Gagliardi Larry Subject eNYMEX I recently met Robert Bo Collins the new President of the NYMEX and formerly with El Paso Bo is keenly aware that the NYMEX has fallen down in two areasfirst catering too much to the locals while ignoring their true customer base and secondly not following through with the eNYMEX rollout Bo along with Vincent Viola the new Chairman of the NYMEX are dedicated to correcting these two problems immediately Personally I think there is a chance that EnronOnline could partner with the NYMEX and it could benefit both Obviously they need us far more than we need them but there is a window of opportunity due to the recent change in the NYMEX management Is this something of interest and if so should we follow up Bo and Vince will be in Houston in late August for a NYMEX cocktail party at ROCC and I could arrange a meeting at Enron

RE eNYMEX Cc legal pst Brad We may consider targeting a wide audience Since these turbines are not the technology of choice for many large corporate entities our target audience may need to be somewhat more diverse Our only prerequisite for purchase is the ability to raise MM plus option fees I have two primary documents One is the spec sheet and a general scope The other is a turbine purchase agreement A counterparty can have two options One is to contact us to provide a bid There would be no price assurance or exclusivity in this case Their other choice is to accept our offer on a turbine option contract For MM they would have a day call on the turbines during which they would be permitted to conduct their due diligence The MM buys them price assurance and an exclusivity period It may be a nuance but our offer price is on the call not the actual turbine Is this consistent with EOLs format Steve Original Message From Richter Brad Sent Wednesday August AM To Kitchen Louise Cc Webb Jay Thome Stephen Taylor Mark E Legal Subject RE eNYMEX Armed with a target list of purchasers we can craft the new product popup to hit those companies systems when they log on which would give them the following information General description of the assets Contact information names numbers Directions on refiltering for the Turbine Product which would be housed under US Power and accessible only to those preapproved companies The Long Description would essentially be the turbines Spec Sheet But if a counterparty clicks on the Offer we could replace the GTCs with a Term Sheet or LOI which binds the counterparty to days of diligence with a breakup fee if the deal doesnt close If the company isnt willing to commit to that the contact information will be their route to getting more information Thoughts Brad Original Message From Kitchen Louise Sent Tuesday August PM To Richter Brad Cc Webb Jay Thome Stephen Taylor Mark E Legal Subject RE eNYMEX Ahha The turbines idea on EOL I dont want to post an advetisement only I want them to post the turbines themselves So essentially just like a new product launch we would have a pop up announcing a new product and the new product would be our turbines exactly the same as any other product They have to post the turbines out there and obviously there will only be an offer and they will be for the ABBs we actually have in Canada You never know someone may click it would be an interesting concept and probably nonbinding as there would be site inspections etc But not an advert actually posting the turbines Louise Original Message From Richter Brad Sent Tuesday August PM To Kitchen Louise Cc Webb Jay Subject RE eNYMEX Bob Shults and I will be attending an eNYMEX reception this Thursday and John and Greg are still trying to coordinate a meeting with Bo and Vincent Short answer weve got it as covered as possible for now Another item I got a call from Stephen Thome in ENA who wanted us to post something like an advertisement for your turbines on EnronOnline Jay confirmed that it was technically feasible to craft a popup that targets certain customers with information and links to documents and spec sheets Im told we have resisted this approach in the past because it has the potential to get out of hand once the genie gets out of the bottle so to speak I think it fits well for the turbines but I wanted to make sure you were behind this idea before we launched into development Brad Original Message From Kitchen Louise Sent Tuesday August AM To Piper Greg Leach Doug Cc Richter Brad Webb Jay Subject RE eNYMEX I am assuming that Greg Piper is going to handle this you may want to talk to John Arnold as he has some good ideas for a deal with Nymex Original Message From Piper Greg Sent Wednesday August AM To Leach Doug Kitchen Louise Cc Richter Brad Webb Jay Whalley Greg Subject RE eNYMEX I would be happy to meet with them so feel free to set something up We have had contact in the past with NYMEX on some of these issues and I can explain the story later My asistant is Tina Spiller and I am in next week I am in London this week so maybe we can get together and discuss thanks GP Original Message From Leach Doug Sent Tuesday August PM To Kitchen Louise Piper Greg Cc Gagliardi Larry Subject eNYMEX I recently met Robert Bo Collins the new President of the NYMEX and formerly with El Paso Bo is keenly aware that the NYMEX has fallen down in two areasfirst catering too much to the locals while ignoring their true customer base and secondly not following through with the eNYMEX rollout Bo along with Vincent Viola the new Chairman of the NYMEX are dedicated to correcting these two problems immediately Personally I think there is a chance that EnronOnline could partner with the NYMEX and it could benefit both Obviously they need us far more than we need them but there is a window of opportunity due to the recent change in the NYMEX management Is this something of interest and if so should we follow up Bo and Vince will be in Houston in late August for a NYMEX cocktail party at ROCC and I could arrange a meeting at Enron

TurbinesJohn I just received this from Panda regarding their project company structure Forwarded by Stephen ThomeHOUECT on AM Lori Holt on AM To cc Jimmy Teringo Subject Turbines Steve I was correct in my assumptions Each turbine should go into four different LPs Panda West Power I LP Panda West Power II LP Panda West PowerIII LP and Panda West Power IV LP Please advise if you have any additional questions Regards Lori

LM Documents Cc Rick Our counsel has provided these drafts of the project documents Please review We also anticipate sending out the turbine contracts later today Please be advised of our timeline Since we need to fund escrow by Wednesday March it is imperative that we are able to sign these documents on Friday March It is our assumption there will be some lag between the obligation to fund escrow and the actual transfer of funds Your comments to these documents are expected by Friday March I also want to mention that Enron initiated the additional purchase of Power System Stabilizers which cost per turbine PSS are required in the WSCC but you will have to determine whether or not your particular project would be required to install these in New England If you desire this optional equipment please reflect that cost in your final bid Steve Forwarded by Stephen ThomeHOUECT on AM

LM Documents Cc has provided these drafts of the project documents Please review We also anticipate sending out the turbine contracts later today Please be advised of our timeline Since we need to fund escrow by Wednesday March it is imperative that we are able to sign these documents on Friday March It is our assumption there will be some lag between the obligation to fund escrow and the actual transfer of funds Your comments to these documents are expected by Friday March I also want to mention that Enron initiated the additional purchase of Power System Stabilizers which cost per turbine PSS are required in the WSCC If you desire this optional equipment please reflect that cost in your final bid Steve Thome Forwarded by Stephen ThomeHOUECT on AM
Turbine Contract Cc is Please call if you have any questions Steve
Turbine Contract Cc the turbine contract Any questions please call Steve Thome

Turbine Contract Revisions Cc Rick Here is a redline of the original turbine contract that I sent out The numbering has been corrected and some changes made to section Let me know how your review is proceeding Our counsel has suggested that you may want to make a trip to Houston to go over the contracts if you have substantive comments We would like to have executable versions by close of business Friday Steve

Fwd Enron Turbine Acquisition Structure Cc graciously extended our option period and is attempting to accellerate our backfill delivery The game is still on Panda included Their redlines are attached below I havent read the documentation but I suspect PandaAEP has been busy all this time recrafting a completely new structure Steve Forwarded by Stephen ThomeHOUECT on PM Lori Holt on PM To cc Bruce Dyer Jimmy Teringo Steve Anderson Subject Fwd Enron Turbine Acquisition Structure Steve Please review and call when you are finished Regards Lori Received from mailaepcom by mailhostpandaenergycom Wed Mar Received from dsmloraepsccom by mailaepcom SwitchSwitch with ESMTP id fLHmu Wed Mar Subject Enron Turbine Acquisition Structure To Cc From Date Wed Mar MessageID XMIMETrack Serialize by Router on DSMLORSERVERSAEPINRelease September at PM MIMEVersion Contenttype multipartmixed BoundaryAAAFfeadfcAAAF ContentDisposition inline Lori Attached you will find a Draft Purchase Sale Agreement under which a synthetic financing entity would acquire from ENext an LLC which has as its sole asset the right to a GE Turbine This structure is desirable to us since it makes a cleaner break and we believe it is permitted by the PO We have also confirmed with our financing entity that it is a structure which is acceptable to them in concept We would like to confirm with GE that this would be acceptable to them and you will also find a form of letter attached which would serve as GEs confirmation of that fact By a separate email in the very near future I am intending to provide a diagram which shows all steps of the deal structure in word processing now Please call with any comments or questionsSee attached file Turbine Acquisition DocumentationDOCSee attached file GE Letterdoc This email message from the Legal Department of American Electric Power is for the sole use of the intended recipients and may contain confidential and privileged information Any unauthorized review use disclosure or distribution is prohibited If you are not the intended recipient please contact the sender by reply email and destroy all copies of the original message Turbine Acquisition DocumentationDOC GE Letterdoc

Re FW FW Revised AIP to reflect changes in deal schedules Units Cc Money did flow yesterday Lee Johnson is coming by today to put his signature on the clean version I have a faxed signature Kay Mann is putting together the turbine contract A draft should be available in the next couple of days This contract is going to be substantially the same as the existing LV breakout contract with changes to payment schedule and delivery A quick synopsis of our deal Units and will come out of eNext under the Salmon breakout contract that is being sold to Delta Power This contract will adhere to the payment schedule delineated in the existing draft of the LV Cogen breakout contract This contract remains substantially the same with the exception of delivery dates and serial numbers asssociated with swapping unit for unit Unit performance will be delineated at ISO conditions Units and will be purchased under a contract similar to the existing LV draft with appropriate changes for delivery payment schedule the one in the AIP and liability amounts the bigger purchase price Steve From Lisa nronXgate on PM To Stephen CT cc Sheila CT Roseann nronXgate Catherine nronXgate Herman nronXgate Subject FW FW Revised AIP to reflect changes in deal schedules Units Steve Was this amended document signed and did money flow yesterday It is imperative that you keep us in Finance in the loop on any documents and associated money needs right from the start along with Teresa Voss in Accounting CSFB needs to receive the executed version of this agreement within days of execution or it is a default under the facility could lead to termination Please also insure that Finance and Finance Legal Rose Engeldorf receive executed copies as well I would appreciate receiving a timeline on when you think the actual turbine purchase contract will be ready for Finance Finance Legal and Accounting to review It cannot be executed as you know until all such parties have signed off on it Thanks Lisa Original Message From Clark Catherine Sent Tuesday April PM To Bills Lisa Engeldorf Roseann Subject FW FW Revised AIP to reflect changes in deal schedules Units This is the purchase contract for the new LM s This is the first time Ive seen it have you seen this before It sounds like they are signing the contract today Original Message From Thome Stephen Sent Tuesday April PM To Vos Theresa Catherine NRON Subject Re FW Revised AIP to reflect changes in deal schedules Units Looks like we will make this payment to GE tomorrow Wednesday for Here is the amended contract I will get invoices and signed originals to you Forwarded by Stephen ThomeHOUECT on PM From Sheila Tweed on PM To ENRON cc Stephen CT Subject Re FW Revised AIP to reflect changes in deal schedules Units Nice try getting us to sign up for four more What a salesman I have made some changes to reflect the First Amended and Restated Agreement in Principle Unless we hear back from you call Steve we will sign the attached I am also corrected the dates in the first paragraph of Appendixs C to April OK PM To cc Subject FW Revised AIP to reflect changes in deal schedules Units Sheila I had that same version so I accepted changes and updated to reflect our current agreement Thanks Lee Original Message From Johnson Lee L PS GE AEP Sent Tuesday April PM To Cc Beaushaw Danetta PS SSEP Subject Revised AIP to reflect changes in deal schedules Units Importance High GETURBINEPURCHASEAGREEMENTLVCOGENredline of execution copyDOC Steve Heres is the revised AIP to reflect what I agreed to with you and Jake Ill see what we can do to get the consent agreement done We know the ball is in our court to firm the order for Units Thanks Lee GETURBINEPURCHASEAGREEMENTLVCOGENredline of execution copyDOC

Payment instructionsare wire instructions Forwarded by Stephen ThomeHOUECT on PM on AM To cc Subject Payment instructions NEW GEPPI BANK ACCOUNT rtf Steve Attached is the new wire transfer instructions for LM unit payments If you have any questions please call me Thanks again Lee Johnson GM N American Sales NEW GEPPI BANK ACCOUNT rtf

Closing Cash FlowsHere is a breakdown of the funds flow Citibank as escrow agent will be wiring funds on Wednesday into the following Enron account Citibank NY ABA Account Number GE is paid directly from escrow We will have to ensure ENext receives their money Steve From Theresa nronXgate on PM CDT To Stephen CT cc Marcus nronXgate Subject FW Delta Turbine Stephen do you have a funds flow diagram Original Message From Edmonds Marcus Sent Thursday April PM To Thome Stephen Thomas Jake Mann Kay Clark Catherine Dennis Tonya Vos Theresa Subject Delta Turbine Hello Attached is the Delta turbine buyout amount for the closing on May This is the amount that can be utilized in your prepayment notice that needs to be sent by am EST on Monday April Have a great day Marcus Turbines Balance on Progress Payments Options I J Y included Option D included Engineering Fees Capitalized Interest Financing Fees from WLB ENext Generation Financing Fee Total

Re DeltaSalmonDo the retainage LOCs flow from the receipt of funds letter or do we need to tee up those separately Steve Kay NRON AM To cc Jake CT Stephen CT Subject DeltaSalmon Good morning In order to finish up DeltaSalmon tomorrow please note we need the following today GE parent guaranty LOC so that full payment can be made to GE tomorrow Opinion of counsel And once funds are received by GE we need the receipt of funds letter Lee I havent heard back from the Portland gang to find out if the LV Co Gen contract is ready Maybe Jake can help shake that loose Thanks Kay

Re DeltaSalmonI just glossed over it I am a speed reader I only read every other word When do you want us to come up Kay NRON AM To Stephen CT cc Subject Re DeltaSalmon Ive asked for it separately second item below Did I misunderstand your question Im setting up a table with all the stuff for signature now Kay Stephen CT AM To Kay NRON cc Subject Re DeltaSalmon Kay Do the retainage LOCs flow from the receipt of funds letter or do we need to tee up those separately Steve Kay NRON AM To cc Jake CT Stephen CT Subject DeltaSalmon Good morning In order to finish up DeltaSalmon tomorrow please note we need the following today GE parent guaranty LOC so that full payment can be made to GE tomorrow Opinion of counsel And once funds are received by GE we need the receipt of funds letter Lee I havent heard back from the Portland gang to find out if the LV Co Gen contract is ready Maybe Jake can help shake that loose Thanks Kay

Re DeltaSalmonshould be fine Jake called He wants to go to dinner tomorrow Actually he wants Ben to take us to dinner I am going to invite Ben The list includes You Me Caroline Carlos Jake Ben Fred Can you make it and ask Caroline if she can make it Can you think of anyone else Does Pappas Steakhouse sound OK Kay NRON AM To Stephen CT cc Subject Re DeltaSalmon Kathleen is coming up to help me set up How about If you see Kathleen can you give her the membership certificates Ill have a stack for Duran later Kay Stephen CT AM To Kay NRON cc Subject Re DeltaSalmon No I just glossed over it I am a speed reader I only read every other word When do you want us to come up Kay NRON AM To Stephen CT cc Subject Re DeltaSalmon Ive asked for it separately second item below Did I misunderstand your question Im setting up a table with all the stuff for signature now Kay Stephen CT AM To Kay NRON cc Subject Re DeltaSalmon Kay Do the retainage LOCs flow from the receipt of funds letter or do we need to tee up those separately Steve Kay NRON AM To cc Jake CT Stephen CT Subject DeltaSalmon Good morning In order to finish up DeltaSalmon tomorrow please note we need the following today GE parent guaranty LOC so that full payment can be made to GE tomorrow Opinion of counsel And once funds are received by GE we need the receipt of funds letter Lee I havent heard back from the Portland gang to find out if the LV Co Gen contract is ready Maybe Jake can help shake that loose Thanks Kay

LOC Cc Please FEDEX and fax the GE LOCs to Rick Vicens at Delta Power Delta Power Headquarters Plaza North Tower th Floor Morristown NJ ph fax Thanks Steve Forwarded by Stephen ThomeHOUECT on AM Anthony Harrington on AM To cc Subject LOC Stephen Was talking to Rick earlier who is out of the office and he asked that I pass the message on to you that you can send the LOC to the office I trust that you understand what Rick means Call me if a problem Tony

LM Documents Cc Rick Our counsel has provided these drafts of the project documents Please review We also anticipate sending out the turbine contracts later today Please be advised of our timeline Since we need to fund escrow by Wednesday March it is imperative that we are able to sign these documents on Friday March It is our assumption there will be some lag between the obligation to fund escrow and the actual transfer of funds Your comments to these documents are expected by Friday March I also want to mention that Enron initiated the additional purchase of Power System Stabilizers which cost per turbine PSS are required in the WSCC but you will have to determine whether or not your particular project would be required to install these in New England If you desire this optional equipment please reflect that cost in your final bid Steve Forwarded by Stephen ThomeHOUECT on AM

LM Documents Cc has provided these drafts of the project documents Please review We also anticipate sending out the turbine contracts later today Please be advised of our timeline Since we need to fund escrow by Wednesday March it is imperative that we are able to sign these documents on Friday March It is our assumption there will be some lag between the obligation to fund escrow and the actual transfer of funds Your comments to these documents are expected by Friday March I also want to mention that Enron initiated the additional purchase of Power System Stabilizers which cost per turbine PSS are required in the WSCC If you desire this optional equipment please reflect that cost in your final bid Steve Thome Forwarded by Stephen ThomeHOUECT on AM

LM Documents Cc Rick Our counsel has provided these drafts of the project documents Please review We also anticipate sending out the turbine contracts later today Please be advised of our timeline Since we need to fund escrow by Wednesday March it is imperative that we are able to sign these documents on Friday March It is our assumption there will be some lag between the obligation to fund escrow and the actual transfer of funds Your comments to these documents are expected by Friday March I also want to mention that Enron initiated the additional purchase of Power System Stabilizers which cost per turbine PSS are required in the WSCC but you will have to determine whether or not your particular project would be required to install these in New England If you desire this optional equipment please reflect that cost in your final bid Steve Forwarded by Stephen ThomeHOUECT on AM

PGE Transmission Contract I spoke last evening with Rich George a lawyer at Portland General Electric He said that EPMI needs to make sure that it only pays the postpetition part of the Dec transmission services invoice received by EPMI on Apparently this bill had Dec prepetition separated I understand that Steve Thome is retrieving the bill to make sure that EPMI pays only the postpetition amount bill is in line to be paid this Friday Rich understands that EPMI is not going to pay the prepetition at this time and said that PGE is not planning to curtail EPMIs transmission However he asked that EPMI consider accepting or rejecting the transmission agreement in bankruptcy court fairly soon MELANIE Can you please let us know what to do in this regard This is a Long Term years remaining electric transmission agreement with an estimated in the money value to EPMI of mill EPMI would consider transferring it or possibly holding it for its value Thanks Original Message From Baughman Edward Sent Friday January PM To Nicolay Christi L Subject FW PGE Transmission Contract Christi Would you please follow up on this transmission issue as well Thanks Ed Original Message From Thome Stephen Sent Friday January PM To Sewell Doug Schneider Chip Cc Crandall Sean Scholtes Diana Baughman Edward Wax Brandon Subject RE PGE Transmission Contract Structuring just estimated the value of this contract at MM Original Message From Thome Stephen Sent Friday January AM To Sewell Doug Schneider Chip Aucoin Evelyn Helton Susan Cc Crandall Sean Scholtes Diana Baughman Edward Wax Brandon Subject PGE Transmission Contract We have not paid PGE Transmission for November invoice on my schedule This contract has intrinsic value going forward Anytime MidC and COB spread exceeds this contract is in the money This is firm transmission Regardless of the issue prepetition claims by utilities if we do not pay these invoices PGE can terminate this contract and force us to go back to OASIS for transmission on a nonfirm basis Significant value will be lost by the estate Structuring is running an NPV of the basis differential We would like to do whatever necessary to convince the estate to pay this prepetition claim Steve

RE eNYMEX Cc legal Brad We may consider targeting a wide audience Since these turbines are not the technology of choice for many large corporate entities our target audience may need to be somewhat more diverse Our only prerequisite for purchase is the ability to raise MM plus option fees I have two primary documents One is the spec sheet and a general scope The other is a turbine purchase agreement A counterparty can have two options One is to contact us to provide a bid There would be no price assurance or exclusivity in this case Their other choice is to accept our offer on a turbine option contract For MM they would have a day call on the turbines during which they would be permitted to conduct their due diligence The MM buys them price assurance and an exclusivity period It may be a nuance but our offer price is on the call not the actual turbine Is this consistent with EOLs format Steve Original Message From Richter Brad Sent Wednesday August AM To Kitchen Louise Cc Webb Jay Thome Stephen Taylor Mark E Legal Subject RE eNYMEX Armed with a target list of purchasers we can craft the new product popup to hit those companies systems when they log on which would give them the following information General description of the assets Contact information names numbers Directions on refiltering for the Turbine Product which would be housed under US Power and accessible only to those preapproved companies The Long Description would essentially be the turbines Spec Sheet But if a counterparty clicks on the Offer we could replace the GTCs with a Term Sheet or LOI which binds the counterparty to days of diligence with a breakup fee if the deal doesnt close If the company isnt willing to commit to that the contact information will be their route to getting more information Thoughts Brad Original Message From Kitchen Louise Sent Tuesday August PM To Richter Brad Cc Webb Jay Thome Stephen Taylor Mark E Legal Subject RE eNYMEX Ahha The turbines idea on EOL I dont want to post an advetisement only I want them to post the turbines themselves So essentially just like a new product launch we would have a pop up announcing a new product and the new product would be our turbines exactly the same as any other product They have to post the turbines out there and obviously there will only be an offer and they will be for the ABBs we actually have in Canada You never know someone may click it would be an interesting concept and probably nonbinding as there would be site inspections etc But not an advert actually posting the turbines Louise Original Message From Richter Brad Sent Tuesday August PM To Kitchen Louise Cc Webb Jay Subject RE eNYMEX Bob Shults and I will be attending an eNYMEX reception this Thursday and John and Greg are still trying to coordinate a meeting with Bo and Vincent Short answer weve got it as covered as possible for now Another item I got a call from Stephen Thome in ENA who wanted us to post something like an advertisement for your turbines on EnronOnline Jay confirmed that it was technically feasible to craft a popup that targets certain customers with information and links to documents and spec sheets Im told we have resisted this approach in the past because it has the potential to get out of hand once the genie gets out of the bottle so to speak I think it fits well for the turbines but I wanted to make sure you were behind this idea before we launched into development Brad Original Message From Kitchen Louise Sent Tuesday August AM To Piper Greg Leach Doug Cc Richter Brad Webb Jay Subject RE eNYMEX I am assuming that Greg Piper is going to handle this you may want to talk to John Arnold as he has some good ideas for a deal with Nymex Original Message From Piper Greg Sent Wednesday August AM To Leach Doug Kitchen Louise Cc Richter Brad Webb Jay Whalley Greg Subject RE eNYMEX I would be happy to meet with them so feel free to set something up We have had contact in the past with NYMEX on some of these issues and I can explain the story later My asistant is Tina Spiller and I am in next week I am in London this week so maybe we can get together and discuss thanks GP Original Message From Leach Doug Sent Tuesday August PM To Kitchen Louise Piper Greg Cc Gagliardi Larry Subject eNYMEX I recently met Robert Bo Collins the new President of the NYMEX and formerly with El Paso Bo is keenly aware that the NYMEX has fallen down in two areasfirst catering too much to the locals while ignoring their true customer base and secondly not following through with the eNYMEX rollout Bo along with Vincent Viola the new Chairman of the NYMEX are dedicated to correcting these two problems immediately Personally I think there is a chance that EnronOnline could partner with the NYMEX and it could benefit both Obviously they need us far more than we need them but there is a window of opportunity due to the recent change in the NYMEX management Is this something of interest and if so should we follow up Bo and Vince will be in Houston in late August for a NYMEX cocktail party at ROCC and I could arrange a meeting at Enron
